TopicTitle: Who else loves seeing the little "Notifications" tab lit up?

Articles.Content: I don't know why, but I always get a little excited when I see it.
Not me. I get somewhat apprehensive, mostly because it's most commonly a PM, and since I'm a moderator they can get quite mean.
I have a mini seizure of happiness when I see it go off! 99.99999% of the time it means rep, and I am kind of a fanatic about that stuff.

Lately the thing has been flickering like a lightbulb that needs changing. Both PM's and Reputation. (Quite a lot of it from Sal_vager, actually. )

Also:

Gah, Vexx32, that avatar is really distracting.

Yeah I love the notification light. It's almost always +rep! In the old days*, when I was more troublesome, I was always a bit worried about infractions.

*2013.

Nah, most of the time it's a PM asking a question answered uncountable amounts of times in the RealChute thread or rep, and since I care very little about internet points, I move along. I'm much happier to see PMs from people that just genuinely come talk to me and from friends I keep contact with from here.

Not me. I get somewhat apprehensive, mostly because it's most commonly a PM, and since I'm a moderator they can get quite mean.

Speaking of which, I still get threads asking to move threads around or to close them -.-

Heh, just pass them on to us. xD

Though, maybe we should draft you back at some point in the future.

Wait stop, hammer time

stupid_chris isn't a moderator anymore?

...Maybe you should change your title then, I had no idea

Lol! Just as I opened this thread the Notification tab lit up.

I always get like this:

when I get a notification. Almost every time it's a guy giving me Rep, since I almost never receive PMs and the last time I commited an infraction was in September. I love me some good imaginary internet points!
Used to, not anymore. Moderating changes that so much.
I love it. And the whole "Destroy Green Iron Crown" Thing has been giving me tons of notifications. I have two rep bars now. TWO BARS!
all my notifications are infractions from RIC for supporting our glorious green monarch....

all my notifications are infractions from RIC for supporting our glorious green monarch....

You lie! Thou hast no infractions!

(Unless they're just PM's. Which I 100% believe that.)

all my notifications are infractions from RIC for supporting our glorious green monarch....

I would +rep you for that, but I overheated my rep cannons

Edited January 21, 2015 by temporalExile

I hate it. I always think a moderator is yelling at me. Even though I did nothing wrong

EDIT: Damnit Ast(r?)o, I thought a moderator may of been yelling at me

Edited January 21, 2015 by TheCanadianVendingMachine

I hate it. I always think a moderator is yelling at me. Even though I did nothing wrong

Really? What makes you think that?

Just happened to me again. And now I've got 4 rep bars.
.... gives Red a hug
It's so fun, epsecially when a post you didn't think much of takes off...

I love it. Back when I was mostly a lurker I would go all

but I'm still not totally used to it now, because I'm just that... err... famous. Yeah.

Although the face still applies!
I love it too, it alway bring a little surprise which is pretty cool

Forgot to actually answer the question:

These forums: Yes, only been rep (and one PM)

Some other forums i'm a moderator for a gaming server on: "crap who wants to be unbanned from the server this time, oh geez, this is like, the 5th time he's asked (ignore)"
Yes. Hell yes.

I adore notifications.

My eyes just light up, and I get a warm feeling inside.

Everyone who's given me rep, you're great!!

Sometimes I get 2 notifications, and then I'm like "SQUEE!!"
Just logged in and had four notifications waiting for me, and all were pleasant! Maybe being a mod isn't so bad after all.

Notification means rep, because no one ever PMs me...

Edit: Thanks for all the PMs guys!

Edited January 26, 2015 by worir4
